code: import{toast}from"react-toastify";export var addToWatchlist=function addToWatchlist(id){var items=localStorage.getItem("watchlist");if(items){var _arr=JSON.parse(items);if(!_arr.includes(id)){_arr.push(id);localStorage.setItem("watchlist",JSON.stringify(_arr));}}else{var arr=JSON.stringify([id]);localStorage.setItem("watchlist",arr);}toast.success("".concat(id.slice(0,1).toUpperCase()+id.slice(1)," - Added To The Watchlist!"));};
